        public GamePlay tradeCards(GamePlay game_state)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkForValidAttack

        public java.lang.String checkForValidAttack(int attacker_territory_armies,
                                            int defender_territory_armies,
                                            int attacker_dice_no,
                                            int defender_dice_no)

        Parameters:
        attacker_territory_armies - The number of armies of Attacker Territory
        defender_territory_armies - The number of armies of Defender Territory
        attacker_dice_no - The number of dice to be rolled by attacker
        defender_dice_no - The number of dice to be rolled by defender
        Returns:
        Valid Attack Message
